data.enText: having the role of giving professional advice
He acted in an advisory capacity only.
an official warning that sth bad is going to happen

tr: an announcement that usually advises or warns the public of some threat

example: an advisory memorandum", "his function was purely consultative

example.ex: ...members of the advisory committee on the safety of nuclear installations...
example.tran: 核设施安全顾问委员会的成员

example.ex: Now my role is strictly advisory.
example.tran: 现在我的角色仅限于顾问。

value.def: An advisory group regularly gives suggestions and help to people or organizations, especially about a particular subject or area of activity.
An advisory is an official announcement or report that warns people about bad weather, diseases, or other dangers or problems.
value.tran: （关于天气、疾病或其他危险、问题的）公告，警告
